CustomField.description: - Formula field used in the Frame "Reasons for Approval" (Related Records Lightning Components) - Used only to show Sales when the criteria is met, that it's a reason for approval.
CustomField.formula: IF (addl_disc_amount_percent__c > 0.50, "05. is above 50%", IF (addl_disc_amount_percent__c > 0.30, "04. is above 30%", IF (addl_disc_amount_percent__c > 0.10, "03. is above 10%", IF (addl_disc_amount_percent__c > 0, "02. Less than 10%","01. No discount" ))))
CustomField.label: Additional Discount:
